items.headline: Keurig Dr Pepper reportedly near $18 billion deal to buy coffee company JDE Peet’s
items.summary_en: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. is closing in on a roughly $18 billion deal to acquire the Dutch coffee company JDE Peet’s NV, the Wall Street Journal reported late Sunday.

items.headline: U.S. stock futures flat following Friday’s Fed-fueled rally
items.summary_en: U.S. stock-market futures were little changed Sunday, after stocks rallied Friday on fresh hopes of a September rate cut by the Fed.

items.headline: ‘I learned a hard lesson’: My ex-husband gambled away our $900,000 life savings. Do I use my 401(k) to buy a home?

items.headline: As a nurse, I’ve seen people use their power of attorney to take advantage of their parents. It would chill you to the bone.

items.headline: After 9 months on hold, the Fed could cut rates in September. Why the long pause may extend stocks’ rally.
items.summary_en: The long pause between rate cuts could be particularly bullish for equities, potentially extending and broadening the stock market’s rally, analysts said.
